biography:
British Theatre are an English electronica-alternative rock band from Manchester, formed in 2011 by former Oceansize members and current Biffy Clyro touring musicians, Mike Vennart and Richard "Gambler" Ingram. The duo released an untitled EP on February 25, 2012, exactly one year on from their former band's break-up.

British Theatre are currently working on their debut studio album. Vennart stated, "There's about twenty songs floating about in differing levels of completion. We’ll hopefully do another EP before the album."

On August 20, 2012, the band released its second EP, Dyed in the Wool Ghost, as a digital download and on 12-inch vinyl.
name: British Theatre

On August 20, 2012, the band released its second EP, Dyed in the Wool Ghost, as a digital download and on 12-inch vinyl.
